Articles.Content: Hi! I'm somewhat new to the world of KSP. I received it as a steam gift in late July. I was hooked after my first launch (even if I slightly murdered Jeb...). There is just so much to do and see. Honestly, very few other games have caught my imagination like KSP has. It has also been a very educational experience. Anyways, I finally decided to join the forums and come out of the shadows, so see you around!
Welcome To Kerbal Space Program, If You Need Any Help Just Ask Me Or Any Other Kerbonaut.

Welcome aboard.

If you've got any questions, just PM me and I'll be glad to help you.
If You'd Like Help Please Pm Anyone You'd Like To
